segment.source: Description: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click Monetization > Promote your app from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: Description: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click Monetization > Promote your app from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: title: Managing your ad campaign
segment.target: title: Managing your ad campaign

segment.source: ms.assetid: 42A9457E-15BD-4A61-B828-1C51D0FC9DA0
segment.target: ms.assetid: 42A9457E-15BD-4A61-B828-1C51D0FC9DA0

segment.source: Managing your ad campaign
segment.target: Managing your ad campaign

segment.source: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click Monetization > Promote your app from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
segment.target: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click Monetization > Promote your app from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

segment.source: The Promote your app page lists all of the ad campaigns associated with your app and displays the impressions, clicks, and installs for each ad campaign.
segment.target: The Promote your app page lists all of the ad campaigns associated with your app and displays the impressions, clicks, and installs for each ad campaign.

segment.source: For more information about impressions, clicks, and installs, see the definitions for these terms in App install ads report.
segment.target: For more information about impressions, clicks, and installs, see the definitions for these terms in App install ads report.

segment.source: To filter the list of ad campaigns, click the Section filters drop-down and choose from the following filters:
segment.target: To filter the list of ad campaigns, click the Section filters drop-down and choose from the following filters:

segment.source: Date: This specifies the data range for impressions, clicks, and installs that are associated with the ad campaigns.
segment.target: Date: This specifies the data range for impressions, clicks, and installs that are associated with the ad campaigns.

segment.source: Status: This specifies the status of the ad campaigns:
segment.target: Status: This specifies the status of the ad campaigns:

segment.source: Active indicates that the ad campaign is running and processing data.
segment.target: Active indicates that the ad campaign is running and processing data.

segment.source: To temporarily pause an ad campaign, click Pause in the Action column of the ad campaigns table.
segment.target: To temporarily pause an ad campaign, click Pause in the Action column of the ad campaigns table.

segment.source: Paused indicates that the ad campaign is temporarily on hold and not processing data.
segment.target: Paused indicates that the ad campaign is temporarily on hold and not processing data.

segment.source: To resume an ad campaign, click Resume in the Action column of the ad campaigns table.
segment.target: To resume an ad campaign, click Resume in the Action column of the ad campaigns table.

segment.source: Ended indicates that the ad campaign has reached the end date you specified when you created or last modified the ad campaign.
segment.target: Ended indicates that the ad campaign has reached the end date you specified when you created or last modified the ad campaign.

segment.source: Needs attention indicates that the ad campaign has issues that need your attention, such as a billing failure or a custom ad design that failed validation.
segment.target: Needs attention indicates that the ad campaign has issues that need your attention, such as a billing failure or a custom ad design that failed validation.

segment.source: To fix the issues, click the text in the Action column of the ad campaigns table.
segment.target: To fix the issues, click the text in the Action column of the ad campaigns table.

segment.source: Campaign type: This specifies whether to display paid or house ad campaigns.
segment.target: Campaign type: This specifies whether to display paid or house ad campaigns.

segment.source: Report
segment.target: Report

segment.source: To see how your ad campaigns are performing, click Analytics > App install ads in the navigation pane of the dashboard.
segment.target: To see how your ad campaigns are performing, click Analytics > App install ads in the navigation pane of the dashboard.

segment.source: For more information about this report, see App install ads report.
segment.target: For more information about this report, see App install ads report.

segment.source: Edit an ad campaign
segment.target: Edit an ad campaign

segment.source: To make changes to an ad campaign, click its name to go to the details page for that ad campaign.
segment.target: To make changes to an ad campaign, click its name to go to the details page for that ad campaign.

segment.source: After you make changes, click Review, review the details, and then click Confirm.
segment.target: After you make changes, click Review, review the details, and then click Confirm.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

source.pc: Create an ad campaign for your app

target.pc: Create an ad campaign for your app
